code: var axios=require('axios');export var GET_SEARCH_VIDEOGAMES='GET__SEARCH_VIDEOGAMES';export var GET_VIDEOGAME_DETAIL='GET_VIDEOGAME_DETAIL';export var CREATE_VIDEOGAME='CREATE_VIDEOGAME';export var DELETE_VIDEOGAME='DELETE_VIDEOGAME';export var GET_ALL_VIDEOGAMES='GET_ALL_VIDEOGAMES';export var GET_GENRES='GET_GENRES';export var GET_FILTERS='GET_FILTERS';export var GET_ORDERS='GET_ORDERS';export function getAllVideogames(){return function(dispatch){return fetch("http://localhost:3001/videogames").then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(games){return dispatch({type:GET_ALL_VIDEOGAMES,payload:games});});};}export function getVideogames(title){console.log(title,'JORGE');return function(dispatch){return fetch("http://localhost:3001/videogames?name=".concat(title)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(games){return dispatch({type:GET_SEARCH_VIDEOGAMES,payload:games});});};}export function getVideogameDetail(id){return function(dispatch){return fetch("http://localhost:3001/videogames/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(detail){return dispatch({type:GET_VIDEOGAME_DETAIL,payload:detail});});};}export function createVideogame(game){return function(dispatch){return axios.post("http://localhost:3001/videogames",game).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(game){return dispatch({type:CREATE_VIDEOGAME,payload:{game:game.data.game,msg:game.data.message}});});};}export function deleteVideogame(id){return function(dispatch){return axios.delete("http://localhost:3001/videogames/".concat(id)).then(function(msg){return dispatch({type:DELETE_VIDEOGAME,payload:msg});});};}export function getGenres(){return function(dispatch){return fetch("http://localhost:3001/genres").then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(genres){return dispatch({type:GET_GENRES,payload:genres});});};}export function getOrders(orders){return{type:GET_ORDERS,payload:orders};}export function getFilters(filterByGenre,filterByOrigin,searchByName){return{type:GET_FILTERS,payload:{filterByGenre:filterByGenre,filterByOrigin:filterByOrigin,searchByName:searchByName}};}
